website_summaries.verdict: The Kinivo Urbn Bluetooth headphones deliver an intensely bass-boosted audio experience in a handsome, uncluttered design.
pros: Powerful audio performance with a seriously bass-forward sound signature
Can be used in wired, passive mode
cons: Massive bass boosting not for those seeking an accurate mix
Picks up some minor device interference

customer_reviews.title: Happy Girl
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase these headphones because they don't look like they would be comfortable. (I guess because the speakers are rectangle-shaped). But, the reviews were mostly positive and they were on sale, so I took the chance... and I'm so glad I did! These are so comfortable that you'll forget you're wearing them! The sound is perfect, and I'm impressed by the quality. Also, as soon as you put them on the noise around you is significantly muffled, even before you turn them on. Perfect for those of us who like to escape into our own minds on occasion, lol. I'm super happy with this find!
customer_reviews.author: wileywidget

customer_reviews.title: Should have known, but can't believe how good these are.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using (Kinivo headphones for years...the 240 model has lasted me well and loved them. Have been using the new URBN ones now for a week or so, and they are even better. Sound-wise, to me anyway, they are fantastic. They fit perfectly, even over a stocking-type cap I wear in the winter. Their service department is excellent (I had some minor issues when I first got the 240) and their response time was quick and fair. Everyone is different, of course, but I highly recommend these for wireless/bluetooth use (they also come with a connection to use as wired and a carrying case.)
customer_reviews.author: hybucket

customer_reviews.title: Hit and miss
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound. They aren't designed for any activity at all. They simply fall off. Noise cancellation is passive, just in the soft ear pads. There is no difference when you turn them on as opposed to just putting them on. Had the older Kinivo headset they still sell and the mic pick up or noise cancelling isn't any better than those. Really was hoping. Also NFC works well, pairs readily, but periodically it won't work with calls which is why I'm returning them. Seller works with warranty issues fairly quickly as the first set the left earpiece was squeaky when moved.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life and great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to replace my Kinivo BTH220 headphones (that lasted for over five years with hours of daily use) and upgraded to the Urbn and they’re just fantastic. Has the same sound quality and ridiculously long battery life I’ve come to love from Kinivo. I almost never review products (and I am not paid by Kinivo or any other company for reviews) but felt these headphones were good enough to warrant leaving one. Battery lasts for quite a long time, over a week and I often forget to turn them off when done using so potentially longer. Fantastic sound, very comfortable on your head (the padding on the headband portion is a nice touch!) Would definitely recommend purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M.

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound not enough bass
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and muted bass and mids, i am not an audiophile and do like very present bass along with associated mids, for the sound was a bit hollow albeit clear. I like the Kinivo bth410 better but not sure if its made anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate low build quality
customer_reviews.text: I had these headphones for a period of maybe six months, before one of the headphone arms cracked and was left hanging by its wire. However, in the time before they broke, they had good range and good sound for bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Casperer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband last Christmas. He is very, very picky about headphones and I purchased this particular headphone because of the reviews. He loves them! At least once a week he thanks me for these and compliments how well they work. He says he can wear them for hours and his ears do not get sore. He also says the sound quality is really good and he is so impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely priced, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: These are FAR nicer than I thought they'd be (regarding the price). They're surprisingly comfortable, and has decent bass. Don't remember seeing it in the description but these have a fail-over headphones jack (and cord) for when the Bluetooth dies. The AptX fidality is exceptional. Very seldom do I see the video getting ahead of the audio with these.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and battery life are very good. Comfort is good. Bought this pair on 09/05/200. Seventeen days later, the padding that touches the top of my head pealed off. I added black electric tape to it and it is fixed. Despite that minor issue, I recommend these headphones for casual TV and music listening.
customer_reviews.author: pi86FR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely impressed. Has just about the sound quality of Bose
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mashburn

customer_reviews.title: Son gives them a big 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: My son gives these headphones a big 👍🏽. He loves how comfortable they are. And, he likes they don't make his ears hot like the round ones he had before. I love the carry case and the subdued style. Great deal for the sale price.
customer_reviews.author: Dfore

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for Hubby
customer_reviews.text: I'd say the fact that he uses them every single day is a pretty good indication that he likes them, which of course, makes me very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: the Kinivo URBN headphones are comfortable, easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the Kinivo URBN headphones are comfortable, easy to operate, connecting to bluetooth devices and sound. i would definitely recommend these headphones to my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, awesome sound, great bass, great everything. Even customer service was amazing. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. These headphones have exceeded my expectations. I was a little worried at first because they are on ear and not over the ear headphones. However they are very comfortable. Even with my glasses on I can wear them for a solid hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, good sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable to wear, heavy on bass, stylish. Low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I DONT RECOMMEND THIS ITEM THIS IS THWE SECOND TIME IT FELL APART AND WONT BLUETOOTH WITH MY COMPUTER
customer_reviews.author: Irma V MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. WAY WORTH THE PRICE POINT.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Literally has everything. You can even track the battery life on your phone. Great sound quality... Can't believe I got these for $50. The fact it also has an analog jack means you can plug in for even better sound quality. There is pause, skip, back and volume buttons... Even has NFC pairing. Super lightweight and comfy. Collapsible into a nice case is a huge plus as well. Only con, my ears get warm. (And if that's all I have to complain about...)
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Wireless Headset
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable and easy to use. Sound is very good. I got these two n a deal and would highly recommend it at $50 but at $100 I would gave a use and shop around for the many similar problems ducts ... Monoprice, etc. overall build is very nice and leather earpieces wear well for long listening times
customer_reviews.author: Slr916

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love the freedom of Bluetooth, and quality of the sound. A great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. D.

customer_reviews.title: Not extremely comfortable on the ear after wearing for an extended period ...
customer_reviews.text: Not extremely comfortable on the ear after wearing for an extended period of time. Was asked to repeat myself on almost every call when using this for hansfree calls. Bluetooth range works great for playing music within my apartment, when my phone is in one room and I'm in another.
customer_reviews.author: Kanika

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had many different headphones including beats, and Bose. The kinivo URBN Bluetooth headphones are by far the best headphones I have ever worn. Beautiful sound, style, and relaxing comfort, the kinivo URBN are the best. And at 50% off with the URBNDEAL code, I almost feel bad for getting them for so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Initially thought there was a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Initially thought there was a problem with them, but it was my poor quality Bluetooth receiver...after replacing these headphones are crystal clear.... Very close to my Bose headphones!! Would recommend a 1k %
customer_reviews.author: Amado Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Kinivo's Customer Service is the Ultimate Best. I had issues with a product I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Kinivo product I purchased! Kinivo's Customer Service is the Ultimate Best. I had issues with a product I bought 3 months prior and they shipped me a replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: Fonda K Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Headphones for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The sound is clear. The headphones are comfortable. Support was helpful in pairing with other devices. Bought the headphones during a cyber-week sale - great headphones at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rowe

product_meta.title: Kinivo URBN Premium Bluetooth Wireless Headphones - NFC Pairing, Powerful AptX HD Sound, Wireless Audio Streaming and Hands-Free Calling for Devices Like iPads, iPhones, Android (Midnight Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BLACKCars, trucks, horns, sirens, whistles, voices, chattering, and yelling - you won't notice the urban soundscape when listening to your pair of Premium Kinivo URBN headphones. It's your world, your city. The URBNs easily connect to any Bluetooth capable device to play rich and clear quality sound or make phone calls wirelessly. The convenient adjustable band and plush protein leather swivel ear pads make for a nice comfortable fit. 

Key Features
- Sound: Full range of High Definition sound and deep bass
- Easy Touch Pairing: NFC (Near Field Communication) allows simple touch pairing to your mobile device 
- Rechargeable: Integrated rechargeable battery provides up to 20 hours of uninterrupted talk/ music time or 800 hours in the standby mode
- Hands-Free calling: The Kinivo URBN has a built-in noise cancelling microphone for excellent clarity during hands-free calling
- Portability: Lightweight, foldable design complete with a stylish carrying case 

Device Compatibility
- iPhone 6S, 6, 5, 4S, 4, 3GS 
- All iPads, iPod Touch, Android phones and tablets
- All other Bluetooth (A2DP) capable devices
- Blackberry and Windows smartphones
- PS3, PS4 (Supports only chat audio)

What's in the Box
- Kinivo URBN HiFi Bluetooth headphones
-Quick reference guide (Full version manual online)
- Micro USB Charging Cable
- Carrying Case 

Warranty
The Kinivo URBN Bluetooth headphones are covered by a 1 year limited hardware warranty.
feature_bullets: Sleek Urban Design: Look stylish in the city with a premium, sturdy design that comes in 3 standout colors
High Definition Sound: For serious ears only. The premium 40mm drivers deliver a full range of high definition sound and booming bass
Wireless Compatibility: Bluetooth 4.1 with NFC for easy one-touch pairing. Compatible with most Bluetooth-enabled devices
Powerful Battery Life: The 20 hour rechargeable Lithium-Ion battery will last you all weekend while you are out on the town
Comfortable Fit: The sturdy adjustable headband and plush protein leather ear pads allow these headphones to fit all sizes of heads for fatigue-free listening

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Wireless, Microphone, Adjustable headband, Lightweight, Noise-Canceling, Foldable, Android
